text: Manasunna Maaraju is a 2000 Telugu drama film directed by Muthyala Subbaiah. The film stars Dr. Rajasekhar and Laya in the lead roles. The film was a remake of the Malayalam film Kottaram Veettile Apputtan. ==Cast== *Dr. Rajasekhar *Laya *Rajitha ==Soundtrack== The soundtrack was composed by Vandemataram Srinivas. *"Nenu Gaali" - Udit Narayan, Anuradha Paudwal, Tippu(Humming) *"O Prema"(Version l) - Sonu Nigam *"O Prema"(Version ll) - Rajesh Krishnan *"Allari Priyuda" - Shankar Mahadevan, Swarnalatha *"Maaghamasam" - Udit Narayan, K. S. Chithra * "Eddulabandi Ekki" -Sukhwinder Singh, Nithyasree Mahadevan * "Oodala Oodala Marri Chettu" - Mano, Sujatha Mohan, Malgudi Subha, Tippu ==References== Category:2000s Telugu-language films Category:Indian drama films Category:Telugu remakes of Malayalam films Category:2000 films Category:Films directed by Muthyala Subbaiah
title: Manasunna Maaraju
